kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about BrowserContext.
kw.msg: {"acceptDownloads": false, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "bypassCSP": false, "viewport": {"height": 768, "width": 1280}, "deviceScaleFactor": 1.0, "isMobile": false, "hasTouch": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "hideRfBrowser": false}

{'acceptDownloads': False, 'ignoreHTTPSErrors': False, 'bypassCSP': False, 'viewport': {'height': 768, 'width': 1280}, 'deviceScaleFactor': 1, 'isMobile': False, 'hasTouch': False, 'javaScriptEnabled': True, 'offline': False, 'hideRfBrowser': False}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://google.com.br/

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Search Product
kw.doc: Fluxo Feliz, partindo da busca do produto, passando pela inserção no carrinho até a página de identificação

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Wait for Element with selector: data-testid=mod-adunit

kw.name: Enter Value
kw.doc: Keyword Auxiliar Para Auxiliar Nas Operações

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Wait for Element with selector: data-testid=input-search

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``text`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Memoria ram ddr4' in the given field.

kw.name: Keyboard Key
kw.doc: Press a keyboard key on the virtual keyboard or set a key up or down.

kw.name: Keyboard Key
kw.doc: Press a keyboard key on the virtual keyboard or set a key up or down.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Wait for Element with selector: data-testid=mod-o

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``. See the `Finding elements` section for details about the selectors.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.
